review: This little box has a lot going for it.  I got it on the cheap from Staples and was immediately impressed by the interface and how snappy the unit operated.  After having it for a month or two now I can't help but disappointed in a lot of things though.  For one Amazon needs to light a match under developers and get some updates to their apps.  For example Netflix is using a last gen interface.  Even my Vizio "smart" TV has the updated interface which in my opinion is better.  Plex doesn't support 5.1 audio...a big minus and per the Plex dev team it is due to Fire TV's OS.  Hulu is somewhat sluggish and shouldn't be on a machine with these specs. HBO Go...nowhere to be found. I get it that it may be on its way but when my Xbox One is getting channel after channel (FXNOW, FOX now, Plex with proper support) and my Fire TV which is supposed to be media focused is so far behind I can't help but have some buyer's remorse.  I ditched my Roku for this box and in many ways I kind of regret it but I know Amazon will come through and make this box magic...it just isn't right now.
